definition: (modal final particle similar to 呢[ne5] or 啦[la5])
mile (unit of length equal to 1,609.344 m)/old form of modern 英里[Ying1 li3]
(onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc

sentences.english: Listen to those children gabbing away.
sentences.chinese: 聽那些孩子嘰哩咕嚕地說個沒完。

sentences.english: Each of them rumbled out his complaint.
sentences.chinese: 他們每位嘰哩咕嚕地抱怨。

sentences.english: He jabbered out the words in what seemed a foreign language.
sentences.chinese: 他嘰哩咕嚕地好像在說外國話。

sentences.english: Listen to those foreigners jabbering away!
sentences.chinese: 聽那些外國人嘰哩咕嚕說個不停。
